system.description:
You strike with a giant weapon or your crocodile tail, breaking enemies: spend 1 Beat to attack all enemies in an area (blast 3) with Bravery. All adjacent targets are slowed.

Immense Crocodile Technique: Spend 2 Beats to blow all targets wide open as well and taunt them until the end of your next riff.

Dragon Blade Cuts Swathes: Spend 3 Beats to rush 3 before the attack. 1 adjacent target is stunned.
system.flavor:
1. Woe, woe be to those that would dare defy the Buwaya!

  2. That ancient god of the rivers, that dragon of the lake.

  3. Woe, and calamity. - Daknunuk Sutla 98
